metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10324 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In libosip2 in GNU oSIP 4.1.0, a malformed SIP message can lead to a heapbuffer overflow in the osip_clrncpy() function defined inosipparser2/osip_port.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10324` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libosip2-11 - 4.1.0-2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libosip2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.0-2.1').
